tool_description: All NBA Stats DATA, Games, Livescore, Standings, Players, Statistics... Documentation : https://api-sports.io/documentation/nba/v2
title: API-NBA

api_list.name: Players Statistics per game id
api_list.description:
Get statistics from one or more players.

> This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

api_list.name: Standings per team and season
api_list.description:
Get the standings for a league & season.

**Available conferences**
* East
* West

**Available divisions**
* Atlantic
* Central
* Northwest
* Pacific
* Southeast
* Southwest

> Parameters `league` & `season` are required.

api_list.name: Standings per division and season
api_list.description:
Get the standings for a league & season.

**Available conferences**
* East
* West

**Available divisions**
* Atlantic
* Central
* Northwest
* Pacific
* Southeast
* Southwest

> Parameters `league` & `season` are required.

api_list.name: Players
api_list.description:
Get data about players.

The player `id` are **unique** in the API and players keep it among all seasons.

> This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

api_list.name: Teams per id
api_list.description:

The team `id` are **unique** in the API and teams keep it among all seasons.

**Available divisions**
* Atlantic
* Central
* Northwest
* Pacific
* Southeast
* Southwest

api_list.name: Games per team and season
api_list.description:
Get the list of games according to the parameters.

**Available status**
* 1 : Not Started
* 2 : live
* 3 : Finished

> This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.description:
Get data about teams.

The team `id` are **unique** in the API and teams keep it among all seasons.

**Available conferences**
* East
* West

**Available divisions**
* Atlantic
* Central
* Northwest
* Pacific
* Southeast
* Southwest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com/teams"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Leagues
api_list.description:
Get the list of available leagues.

All `leagues` can be used in other endpoints as filters.

**Available leagues**
* Africa
* Orlando
* Sacramento
* Standard
* Utah
* Vegas

> This endpoint does not require any parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com/leagues"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Seasons
api_list.description:
All `seasons` can be used in other endpoints as filters. Seasons are only **4-digit keys** like `YYYY`.

> This endpoint does not require any parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com/seasons"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-nba-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
